hero.title: The Graph Docs
hero.description: Kick-start your web3 project with the tools to extract, transform, and load blockchain data.

products.title: The Graph’s Products
products.description: Choose a solution that fits your needs—interact with blockchain data your way.

subgraphs.title: Subgraphs
subgraphs.description: Extract, process, and query blockchain data with open APIs.

substreams.title: Substreams
substreams.description: Fetch and consume blockchain data with parallel execution.

sps.title: Substreams-Powered Subgraphs
sps.description: Boost your subgraph’s efficiency and scalability by using Substreams.

graphNode.title: Nœud de The Graph
graphNode.description: Index blockchain data and serve it via GraphQL queries.
graphNode.cta: Set up a local Graph Node

firehose.title: Firehose
firehose.description: Extract blockchain data into flat files to enhance sync times and streaming capabilities.

description.base: The Graph supports {0}. To add a new network, {1}

explorer.title: Find Data in Graph Explorer
explorer.description: Leverage hundreds of public subgraphs for existing blockchain data.

publishASubgraph.title: Publish a Subgraph
publishASubgraph.description: Add your subgraph to the decentralized network.

publishSubstreams.title: Publish Substreams
publishSubstreams.description: Launch your Substreams package to the Substreams Registry.

queryingBestPractices.title: Bonnes pratiques d'interrogation
queryingBestPractices.description: Optimize your subgraph queries for faster, better results.

apiKeyManagement.title: API Key Management
apiKeyManagement.description: Easily create, manage, and secure API keys for your subgraphs.

transferToTheGraph.title: Transfer to The Graph
transferToTheGraph.description: Seamlessly upgrade your subgraph from any platform.

theGraphExplained.title: The Graph Explained In 1 Minute
theGraphExplained.description: What is The Graph? How does it work? Why does it matter so much to web3 developers? Learn how and why The Graph is the backbone of web3 in this short, non-technical video.

whatIsDelegating.title: Qu'est-ce que la délégation ?
whatIsDelegating.description: Delegators are key participants who help secure The Graph by staking their GRT tokens to Indexers. This video explains key concepts to understand before delegating.

howToIndexSolana.title: How to Index Solana with a Substreams-powered Subgraph
howToIndexSolana.description: If you’re familiar with subgraphs, discover how Substreams offer a different approach for key use cases. This video walks you through the process of building your first Substreams-powered subgraph.
